From the condo balcony



When we arrived, it was snowing, but the weather cleared up for the rest of our stay.
Taken Sunday, March 24, 2002, 04:42:19pm.  Original image size: 1600x1200, 1.0Mb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/25s @ F5.6, ISO 100, 205mm
